trends: There have been no other sightings in Etna Green
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsheard strange motor sounds that i never heard before tried to see where they were coming from and suddenly they were above us quite low in triangle shape .went over us slowly and i followed it by eye as it crossed over US30 until i could no longer see i thoughtn it was a plane until it got close enough for us to see that it wasnt i was dumbfounded and a little scared at the time i am still scared to think about it. the lights were not pulsating. i could not see the body of it only the lights it was only traveling about 20 miles ann hour everything became still after it passed for a while no crickets or any thing made a sound afterwards for about 10 minutes at the time when we first saw it we were getting ready for a camp fire
